name: Diplomacy
effect: :effect_map: For every Dwelling you have, draw 1 corresponding [Neutral Unit](../units/index.md) card. You can **Recruit** one of these [units](../units/index.md) if you :pay: its Recruitment cost.
expert_effect: :instant: Skip Combat with [Neutral Units](../units/index.md) on a field whose Field Difficulty is equal to your Hero's level. Visit the field. This Hero gains no Experience.
